mapper.insert: insert into chas_yw_cssp (ID, ISDEL, DATA_FLAG, LRR_SFZH, LRSJ, XGR_SFZH, XGSJ, BAQID, BAQMC, YWBH, RYBH, RYXM, LKYY, LKSJ, HLSJ, SPR_SFZH, SPR_XM, ZBDW_BH, ZBDW_MC, ZBR_SFZH, ZBR_XM, SPZT, SPYJ, SPSJ, RYZT, LKYYDM, LKLX,DWXTBH) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isdel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{dataflag,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{lrrSfzh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lrsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{xgrSfzh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{xgsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{baqid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{baqmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ywbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rybh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ryxm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lkyy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lksj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{hlsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{sprSfzh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sprXm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zbdwBh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zbdwMc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zbrSfzh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zbrXm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{spzt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{spyj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{spsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{ryzt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lkyydm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lklx,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{dwxtbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update chas_yw_cssp set ISDEL = #{isdel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, DATA_FLAG = #{dataflag,jdbcType=CHAR}, LRR_SFZH = #{lrrSfzh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LRSJ = #{lrsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, XGR_SFZH = #{xgrSfzh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, XGSJ = date_trunc('second', now()), BAQID = #{baqid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BAQMC = #{baqmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, YWBH = #{ywbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RYBH = #{rybh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RYXM = #{ryxm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LKYY = #{lkyy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LKSJ = #{lksj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, HLSJ = #{hlsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, SPR_SFZH = #{sprSfzh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SPR_XM = #{sprXm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ZBDW_BH = #{zbdwBh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ZBDW_MC = #{zbdwMc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ZBR_SFZH = #{zbrSfzh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ZBR_XM = #{zbrXm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SPZT = #{spzt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SPYJ = #{spyj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SPSJ = #{spsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, RYZT = #{ryzt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LKYYDM = #{lkyydm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LKLX = #{lklx,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DWXTBH = #{dwxtbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select ID, ISDEL, DATA_FLAG, LRR_SFZH, LRSJ, XGR_SFZH, XGSJ, BAQID, BAQMC, YWBH, RYBH, RYXM, LKYY, LKSJ, HLSJ, SPR_SFZH, SPR_XM, ZBDW_BH, ZBDW_MC, ZBR_SFZH, ZBR_XM, SPZT, SPYJ, SPSJ, RYZT, LKYYDM, LKLX,DWXTBH from chas_yw_cssp where isdel = 0 and ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select ID, ISDEL, DATA_FLAG, LRR_SFZH, LRSJ, XGR_SFZH, XGSJ, BAQID, BAQMC, YWBH, RYBH, RYXM, LKYY, LKSJ, HLSJ, SPR_SFZH, SPR_XM, ZBDW_BH, ZBDW_MC, ZBR_SFZH, ZBR_XM, SPZT, SPYJ, SPSJ, RYZT, LKYYDM, LKLX,DWXTBH from chas_yw_cssp
1=1 and ISDEL = 0
and RYBH = '${rybh}'
and BAQID = '${baqid}'
and LKLX = '${lklx}'
and SPZT = '${spzt}'
and LKLX != '${cslx}'
and RYZT = '${ryzt}'
and LKSJ IS NOT NULL
and (LKSJ IS NOT NULL or HLSJ is not null)
and DWXTBH LIKE CONCAT(left(#{orgSysCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},2),'%')
and DWXTBH LIKE CONCAT(left(#{orgSysCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},4),'%')
and DWXTBH LIKE CONCAT(left(#{orgSysCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},6),'%')
and DWXTBH LIKE CONCAT(left(#{orgSysCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},8),'%')
and LRR_SFZH = #{idCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
